name: Origin-server
tagline: Public open source repository for the OpenShift Origin server components
body:
#REST API Documentation version 1.5
####Resources
* [api](api)
* [domain](domain)
* [cartridge](cartridge)
* [authorization](authorization)
* [application](application)
* [alias](alias)

###api
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####API entry point
    GET /broker/rest/api
####Get environment information
    GET /broker/rest/environment
####Get user information
    GET /broker/rest/user
####List quickstarts
    GET /api/v1/quickstarts/promoted.json
####Retrieve quickstart with :id
    GET /api/v1/quickstarts/:id
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|:id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Search quickstarts
    GET /api/v1/quickstarts.json
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|search | Yes | [] | N/A|
###domain
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List domains
    GET /broker/rest/domains
####Create new domain
    POST /broker/rest/domains
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Get domain
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id
####Update domain
    PUT /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Delete domain
    DELETE /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|force | No | [true, false] | false|
###cartridge
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List cartridges
    GET /broker/rest/cartridges
####Add embedded cartridge
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|name | Yes | ["mongodb-2.2", "cron-1.4", "phpmyadmin-3.4", "haproxy-1.4", "mock-plugin-0.1", "10gen-mms-agent-0.1", "postgresql-8.4", "switchyard-0.6", "metrics-0.1", "jenkins-client-1.4", "mysql-5.1", "rockmongo-1.1"] | N/A|
|colocate_with | No | ["diy-0.1"] | |
|scales_from | No | [] | |
|scales_to | No | [] | |
|additional_storage | No | [] | |
|url | No | [] | |
####List embedded cartridges
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges
####Get cartridge
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges/mongodb-2.2
####Update cartridge configuration
    PUT /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges/mongodb-2.2
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|additional_gear_storage | No | [] | |
|scales_from | No | [] | |
|scales_to | No | [] | |
####Start embedded cartridge
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["start"] | N/A|
####Stop cartridge
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["stop"] | N/A|
####Restart cartridge
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["restart"] | N/A|
####Reload cartridge
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges/mongodb-2.2/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["reload"] | N/A|
####Delete cartridge
    DELETE /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/cartridges/mongodb-2.2
###authorization
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List authorizations
    GET /broker/rest/user/authorizations
####Retrieve authorization :id
    GET /broker/rest/user/authorizations/:id
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|:id | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Add new authorization
    POST /broker/rest/user/authorizations
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|scope | No | ["session", "read", "userinfo"] | userinfo|
|note | No | [] | |
|expires_in | No | [] | -1|
|reuse | No | [true, false] | false|
####Get authorization
    GET /broker/rest/user/authorizations/51b20a7c701b2ea5e30000e5
####Update authorization
    PUT /broker/rest/user/authorizations/51b20a7c701b2ea5e30000e5
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|note | Yes | [] | N/A|
####Delete authorization
    DELETE /broker/rest/user/authorizations/51b20a7c701b2ea5e30000e5
###application
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####List applications
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications
####Create new application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|name | Yes | [] | N/A|
|cartridges | No | ["diy-0.1", "php-5.3", "jbossas-7", "perl-5.10", "mock-0.1", "mock-0.2", "zend-5.6", "jenkins-1.4", "nodejs-0.6", "jbossews-2.0", "jbossews-1.0", "jbosseap-6.0", "python-2.6", "python-2.7", "python-3.3", "ruby-1.9", "ruby-1.8"] | |
|scale | No | [true, false] | false|
|gear_profile | No | ["small"] | small|
|initial_git_url | No | [] | |
|cartridges[][url] | No | [] | |
####Get application
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id
####Get application descriptor
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/descriptor
####Get application gear groups
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/gear_groups
####Start application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["start"] | N/A|
####Stop application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["stop"] | N/A|
####Restart application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["restart"] | N/A|
####Force stop application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["force-stop"] | N/A|
####Scale up application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["scale-up"] | N/A|
####Scale down application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["scale-down"] | N/A|
####Tidy the application framework
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["tidy"] | N/A|
####Reload the application
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["reload"] | N/A|
####Trigger thread dump
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/events
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|event | Yes | ["thread-dump"] | N/A|
####Delete application
    DELETE /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id
####Resolve DNS
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/dns_resolvable
###alias
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
This is where we describe the resource. This is where we describe the resource. 
####Create new alias
    POST /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/aliases
#####Request Parameters
| Name | Required | Valid Options | Default Value |
| --- | --- | ---| --- |
|id | Yes | [] | N/A|
|ssl_certificate | No | [] | |
|private_key | No | [] | |
|pass_phrase | No | [] | |
####List application aliases
    GET /broker/rest/domains/:domain_id/applications/:application_id/aliases
